Parameters: error code returned by @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#checkGooglePlusApp_E@ call. If errorCode is @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#SUCCESS_E@ then null is returned.
parent activity for creating the dialog, also used for identifying language to display dialog in.
The non-negative request code given when calling @B_android#app#Activity#startActivityForResult_E@.
getErrorDialog(int, android.app.Activity.Description: Returns a dialog to address the provided errorCode. Upon confirmation, the user is directed to either the Google Play Store or the System App Settings screen to resolve the error.
getErrorDialog(int, android.app.Activity.FullName: public static Dialog getErrorDialog (int errorCode, Activity activity, int requestCode)

Returns: One of the status codes that is defined by this class: @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#APP_DISABLED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#APP_MISSING_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#APP_UPDATE_REQUIRED_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#GooglePlusUtil#SUCCESS_E@
checkGooglePlusApp(android.content.Conte.Description: Checks if the version of the Google+ app installed on this device is up-to-date.

ClassDesc: Utility class for verifying that the Google+ app is available and up-to-date on this device.
